meanings.sent1: Her precociousnesses in academics amazed her teachers.
meanings.sent2: His precociousnesses were evident from a young age.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's precociousnesses in reading led to her finishing all the books in the library.
meanings.sent4: The garden's precociousnesses in blooming early brought joy to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's precociousnesses in learning tricks made it a favorite among the family.

meanings.sent1: The precociousnesses of the child surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: We marveled at the precociousnesses displayed by the young artist.
meanings.sent3: The cat's precociousnesses in opening doors caused some amusing chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: The city's precociousnesses in embracing new technology set it apart from others.
meanings.sent5: The tree's precociousnesses in bearing fruit early delighted the orchard owner.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of showing early development or maturity.
meanings.sent1: His precociousnesses in music made him a prodigy.
meanings.sent2: The precociousnesses of the young athlete impressed the coaches.
meanings.sent3: The robot's precociousnesses in problem-solving provided entertainment for the scientists.
meanings.sent4: The flower's precociousnesses in blooming early symbolized hope and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The child's precociousnesses in understanding complex concepts astounded the adults.
